en.biography.about-me:
I started programming at 16 with game mods, eventually i fell in love with behind-scene logic on games until i started developing websites with PHP... since PHP is only server logic i studied all the fundations and methods for coding servers, shortly after i started studying front-end programming languages because i did not always have a front-end developer partner to help me with client's logic, with this i learned JavaScript and CSS, thanks to it i was able to move to Node.JS and start making more complex applications like "real-time chat" and developing API Rest applications.

I am always eager to learn and accept all kind of challenges that i might face in the future, i love correcting errors because they help to improve not only the program but also myself.

es.biography.about-me:
Empeze la programacion a los 16 con mods de juegos, eventualmente me enamore con la logica detras de los juegos hasta que empeze a desarrollar sitios web con PHP... ya que PHP es solo logica de servidor, estudie todos los funtamentos y metodos para programar servicores, poco despues empeze a estudiar programacion front-end porque no siempre tenia a un compa√±ero desarrolador front-end que me ayudara con la logica del cliente, con esto aprendi JavaScript y CSS, gracias a eso tuve la posibilidad de mudarme a Node.JS y empezar a crear aplicationes mas complejas como "chat en tiempo-real" y desarrolar aplicationes API Rest. 

Siempre tengo el deseo de aprender y aceptar todo tipo de retos que podria enfrentar en el futuro, yo amo corregit errores porque ellos ayudan a mejorar no solo al programa, sino a mi tambien.
